mapper.select: select category_no, category_name from category where ref_category_no = 3
mapper.insert: insert into board ( user_no, board_code, board_title, board_content ) values( #{userNo}, 3, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: select count(b.board_no) from board b join board_category bc on (b.board_no = bc.board_no) join category c on (bc.category_no = c.category_no) where board_code = 4 and board_Level = 1 and b.board_status = 'Y'
